attributes.action: Stop Sandbach High School and Sixth Form College admiting males into the Sixth Form
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Even after all the evidence in support of colaboration between Sandbach School and Sanbach High School, Sandbach High School are still deciding to go through with admiting boys into their sixth form and therefore promoting compition between the two schools.  This petition is to bring this to the attention of The Prime Minister and the Secretary of State for Children, Schools and Families.
